alert.note: Alert for Scotts Bluff National Monument, Wildcat Hills (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 03 at 5:23PM CDT until April 03 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING UNTIL 7 PM MDT TODAY FOR SOUTHERN NEBRASKA PANHANDLE... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH MONDAY AFTERNOON AND EARLY EVENING FOR NORTHERN NEBRASKA PANHANDLE... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 313... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zone 313. * WIND...Northwest 20 to 25 mph sustained with gusts to 40 mph. * HUMIDITY...12 to 15 percent this afternoon. * HAINES...5 or Moderate Potential for large fire growth. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of gusty winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Scotts Bluff National Monument, Wildcat Hills
